## symbol() function

Returns the ASCII symbol for each piece. White pieces are in uppercase, black in lowercase.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function symbol({ type, color }: Piece): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { type, color } | [Piece](./chess.ts.piece.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
